author: Cortex XSOAR

commands.description: Returns a list of the commit in accordance with the included and excluded branches.
commands.name: bitbucket-commit-list

commands.description: Deletes a specific comment in a specific pull request.
commands.name: bitbucket-pull-request-comment-delete

commands.description: Updates a specific comment on a given issue.
commands.name: bitbucket-issue-comment-update

commands.description: Returns a list of the open branches.
commands.name: bitbucket-open-branch-list

commands.description: Updates a specific comment in a specific pull request.
commands.name: bitbucket-pull-request-comment-update

commands.description: Returns a list of comments of a specific pull request.
commands.name: bitbucket-pull-request-comment-list

commands.description: Updates an issue in Bitbucket. To perform this command, create an issue tracker by clicking on the relevant repo > Repository settings > Issue tracker.
commands.name: bitbucket-issue-update

commands.description: Creates a comment on an issue in Bitbucket.
commands.name: bitbucket-issue-comment-create

commands.description: Returns the information of the requested branch.
commands.name: bitbucket-branch-get

commands.description: Creates a new commit in Bitbucket.
commands.name: bitbucket-commit-create

commands.description: Returns the content of the given file, along with the option to download it.
commands.name: bitbucket-raw-file-get

commands.description: If a project_key is given, returns the requested project. Else, returns a list of the projects in the workspace.
commands.name: bitbucket-project-list

commands.description: Creates a new branch in Bitbucket.
commands.name: bitbucket-branch-create

commands.description: Returns a list of comments on a specific issue. If a comment_id is given it will return information only about the specific comment.
commands.name: bitbucket-issue-comment-list

commands.description: Updates a pull request in Bitbucket.
commands.name: bitbucket-pull-request-update

commands.description: Returns a list of the pull requests. If a state is provided than the list will contain only PRs with the wanted status. If a state is not provided, by default a list of the open pull requests will return.
commands.name: bitbucket-pull-request-list

commands.description: Returns a list of all the members in the workspace.
commands.name: bitbucket-workspace-member-list

commands.description: Creates a new comment on a pull request.
commands.name: bitbucket-pull-request-comment-create

commands.description: Deletes a comment on an issue in Bitbucket.
commands.name: bitbucket-issue-comment-delete

commands.description: Deletes the given file from Bitbucket.
commands.name: bitbucket-file-delete

commands.description: Deletes the given branch from Bitbucket.
commands.name: bitbucket-branch-delete

commands.description: Creates a pull request in Bitbucket.
commands.name: bitbucket-pull-request-create

commands.description: Creates an issue in Bitbucket. To perform this command, create an issue tracker by clicking on the relevant repo > Repository settings > Issue tracker.
commands.name: bitbucket-issue-create

commands.description: If an issue_id is given, returns the information about it. Otherwise, returns a list of all the issues, according to the limit parameter.
commands.name: bitbucket-issue-list

integration.description: Bitbucket Cloud is a Git-based code and CI/CD tool optimized for teams using Jira.
integration.name: Bitbucket

description: Bitbucket Cloud is a Git-based code and CI/CD tool optimized for teams using Jira
name: Bitbucket
readme:
## What does this pack do?
- Returns a specific project or a list of projects in a workspace.
- Returns a list of the open branches.
- Returns the information of the requested branch.
- Creates or deletes a branch in Bitbucket.
- Creates a new commit in Bitbucket.
- Returns a list of the commits in accordance with the included and excluded branches.
- Deletes a given file from Bitbucket.
- Returns the content of the given file, along with the option to download it.
- Creates or updates an issue in Bitbucket.
- Returns a specific issue or a list of all the issues, according to the limit parameter.
- Creates or updates a pull request in Bitbucket.
- Returns a list of the pull requests.
- Creates, updates, or deletes a comment on an issue in Bitbucket.
- Returns a list of comments on a specific issue.
- Creates, updates or deletes a comment on a pull request.
- Returns a list of comments of a specific pull request.
- Returns a list of all the members in the workspace.
